title: Tech Mahindra Q3 result | Consolidated net profit rises 2.2% QoQ to Rs 1,368.5 crore - Moneycontrol.com
content: Tech Mahindra Q3 result | Consolidated net profit rises 2.2% QoQ to Rs 1,368.5 crore  Moneycontrol.com
description: Tech Mahindra Q3 result | The IT company reported a 5.2 percent sequential rise in consolidated revenues of Rs 11,451 crore.
